commit message: Added new translated strings for v0.9.97 and above ;)

Merge pull request #19 from BytEvil/master

Added new translated strings for v0.9.97 and above ;)

Don't do anything when the profile loader is reset

Previously, the current profile would be erased from the preferences.
Since the loader would always reset when the activity stops, the
current profile would be forgotten every time.

Fixes #20

When receiving a redirect response, get the new location from the
header and use that when repeating the request.
